p: The hydrodistillation of dry plant materials yielded 1.21%, 0.93% and 0.84% of essential oils, for Clinopodium nepeta subsp. nepeta (CNN), Clinopodium nepeta subsp. glandulosum from Béni-M’tir (CNG 1), and Clinopodium nepeta subsp. glandulosum from Bizerta (CNG 2), respectively. The percent occurrence of the oil phytochemicals, elucidated through GC-MS, is summarized in Table 2.
